extendedInfo.description: Capitec Bank Online is a security application that allows Capitec Bank clients to identify themselves and authenticate transactions using their cellphone during Internet Banking sessions. Once youâve registered for Internet Banking and downloaded and installed this application, remember to keep your:â¢	cellphone safe and in your possession at all timesâ¢	online PIN (personal identification number) secretTo register for Internet Banking, visit your nearest Capitec Bank. For more information, call our 24hr Client Care Centre on 0860 10 20 43.

reviews.title: Don\'t download
reviews.comment: This is a great app but it won\'t work when you downloaded from play. You need to visit your nearest branch they send you a link to download.
reviews.author: Mxolisi Baloyi

reviews.title: What the?
reviews.comment: How the living hell do I get into my account? It doesn\'t help when entering my account details.  What a useless app.
reviews.author: Jacques Kuun

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: So Capitec has amazed me with everything so far but sadly they put this app here to fool you, It dosint help if you download it from here as you have to go to a branch, Sig please find away around this some people like myself constantly do upgrades on there phones to test mobile apps as this is part of my job and i hate going into the branch
reviews.author: Francois Rautenbach

reviews.title: Works flawless
reviews.comment: Has good security measures.  So if someone clones your sim card and installs the app on there phone, it wont work without them needing verify it is you at the bank, thus protecting you!
reviews.author: Charl White

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: Nice and convenient to install from playstore. Just make sure to visit your  nearest branch first to reset your password/pin
reviews.author: Frans Matshete

reviews.comment: Totally useless even though I actvated it at my branch.:(
reviews.author: Ronelle Le Roux

reviews.title: Activation Code not bank app
reviews.comment: How in the world do you get this? The call center can\'t even help. Seems you got go to branch. When you get activation code you Will discover its only a token app and you cannot do online banking with it.
reviews.author: Bevan Killian

reviews.title: Perfect app
reviews.comment: Capitec once again leads the way. First came finger print then the token now an app for verification. Brilliant for u always have your cell not always ur token. More secure than sms
reviews.author: Asad Patel

reviews.title: Useless downloading from here.
reviews.comment: This app needs an authentication code which can only be gotten at a Capitec branch, in fact they give you a link at the branch to download the app.  Having it here at Play is therefore entirely useless, as you have to remove it anywhere and re-download at the branch.  Don\'t see the point of having it here!
reviews.author: roger shannon

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The app works perfectly. Easy and secure. UNFORTUNATELY if you update your rom as regular as I do then you have to go to a branch to have it re-activated... So all in all 9/10
reviews.author: Wayne Sinden

reviews.title: App doe nor work
reviews.comment: This app is useless and it deserves a ZERO Star. Why would Capitec be so cruel to advice us on online service app only to ask for an Activation Code. Where in this world should one find this code if we do our app surfing on the road. Play store needs to fine Capitec bank for waisting our data bundles to download such a ussless app.
reviews.author: Tshegofatso M

reviews.title: Gosh a struggle from day1
reviews.comment: Using this app has been a struggle. I struggled to install it with the link that was smsd to me now m struggling to use the damn thing. Capitec, PLZZ, consider going back to the drawing board!!
reviews.author: Nomthokozisi Selanto

reviews.title: Think for yourself!
reviews.comment: I dont understand everybodys issue with this app? It does exactly what its supposed to! Its used to minimalise security risks associated with internet banking. Thats it! Don\'t complain about having to go into a branch when its for your security! Don\'t complain about it not being able to do internet banking, use your darn cellphone banking! If you still dont know what its used for, search \'security token\' in google or wikipedia. Grow up and think a little!!!
reviews.author: Jean-Francois du Toit

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is an usefull app,  but time for a banking app for transfers and etc.
reviews.author: Jean Hewetson

reviews.title: Useless app
reviews.comment: Its a code verification app... theres only two things you can do on it and that is change your online PIN and generate a token number from it. No transacting nadaaa! for banking you need to go back to USSD which is more expensive at roughly 20c per request.
reviews.author: Tshilidzi Phuravhathu

reviews.title: Not sure what this does
reviews.comment: Reading the other reviews it appears that this is not a banking app but rather a replacement for the keyfobs used to authenticate when using online banking.  This however is not clear in the app description and does not provide any indication of how to obtain the activation code it requests upon opening the app.
reviews.author: Jan Strydom

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: I was under the impression this is a app like where you have full access thru the app on your account. But this app only replace the token I\'m using for internetbanking. Am I wrong?
reviews.author: d dp

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is very good replacement for the token but it would be nice to do transaction on it etc.
reviews.author: Stefan Potgieter

reviews.title: Crap...
reviews.comment: There\'s a version that used to work perfectly, like perfectly!!! For this one a rating of zero is......
reviews.author: Jabulani Sokhela
